mapper.select: SELECT vot.id,vot.pm_id,vot.username,vot.icon,vot.tittle,vot.picture,vot.text,vot.create_time,vot.start_number,tt.id AS tt_id,tt.tag_name FROM (SELECT * FROM view_of_topic ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageNumber},6) AS vot,topic_tag AS tt,topic_tag_relation AS ttr WHERE vot.id=ttr.t_id AND tt.id=ttr.tt_id ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT vot.id,vot.pm_id,vot.username,vot.icon,vot.tittle,vot.picture,vot.text,vot.create_time,vot.start_number,tt.id AS tt_id,tt.tag_name FROM (SELECT * FROM view_of_topic ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageNumber},6) AS vot,topic_tag AS tt,topic_tag_relation AS ttr WHERE vot.id=ttr.t_id AND tt.id=ttr.tt_id AND vot.username=#{username} ORDER BY create_time DESC
